commands.description: Get a person's comments ``.comments [username] [number of comments]``
Get a person's saved posts ``.saved [username] [number of posts]``
Get a person's upvoted posts ``.upvoted [username] [number of posts]``
Get a person's downvoted posts ``.downvoted [username] [number of posts]``
Get a person's posts ``.posts [username] [number of posts]``
